pages.text: The $(item)Zephy Harness$() makes its wearer unstoppable like the strongest wind, completely negating most forms of $(marked)knockback$().$(br2)Other than that, the Harness allows its wearer to hurl entities into the air when punching them with only their fist. This, however, consumes $(marked)ME$().
$(o)The Zephyr Harness can be equipped in the $(marked)Belt$()$(o) trinket slot$().
